topic.title: XSS on ZeroNet
topic.body:
There is a small XSS on the ZeroNet.
For example, if you go to http://127.0.0.1:43110/%3Cdiv%20style=%22color:pink;zoom:20;background:black;%22%3EFOO%3C/div%3E
You could see that the / path is "vulnerable" to XSS injection.
Nothing bad however :-)

1_13NzkresWLd7Eda21KhEWox3BqrASnVTyD.body:
> [nofish](#comment_364_1J3rJ8ecnwH2EPYa6MrgZttBNc61ACFiCj): Thanks for reporting, pushed a quickfix for it: https://github.com/HelloZeroNet/ZeroNet/commit/5b59da2435691f6859e8942e3365ce402893dc0f
> You can update your client using â‹® > Update ZeroNet on ZeroHello

Great job !
